components/sidebar/sidebar:
{{> components/navigation/main-navigation type='categories' navigation=categories show_all=true show_count=theme_settings.show_product_count }} {{#if theme_settings.sidebar_link_list '==' 'pages'}} {{> components/navigation/main-navigation type='pages' navigation=pages show_all=false show_count=false }} {{else}}
{{> components/common/link-lists type=theme_settings.sidebar_link_list }}
{{/if}}
{{> components/common/currency-selector}}
svg/chevron-left:
<svg width="7" height="12" viewBox="0 0 7 12" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="presentation">
  <path d="M6.01 10.648l-.71.704L-.01 6 5.3.648l.71.704L1.4 6" fill="currentColor"/>
</svg>
components/navigation/navigation-item-lo:
{{name}} {{#if show_count}} {{count}} {{/if}} {{#if children}} {{> svg/chevron-right}}
  • {{#if show_all}} {{lang 'header.all'}} {{name}} {{else}} {{name}} {{/if}} {{#if show_count}} {{count}} {{/if}}
    • {{#each children}}
  • {{> components/navigation/navigation-item-loop show_all=../show_all show_count=../show_count }}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}}
svg/chevron-right:
